transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello, Karamveer Sahu ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Haan, Sahu ji se baat kar raha tha, main IndiaMART office se bol raha hun, theek hai?
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji. Sir, ye aapki company chal rahi thi Karamveer Sahu ke naam se IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Ji. Kuch problem aap face kar rahe hain sir, abhi mere paas Suraj aaya tha, aapki baat hui hogi, kuch services band karne ke liye aapne bola hua hai, kya issue aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Issue kya hai, jab company hum subscribe iska kiye na plan,
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Plan ka subscribe karne se pehle jo vyakti se IndiaMART ke jo koi vyakti honge jo call kiye the humko, to unse baat hua tha ki wo bole the humko buyer aur supplier dono denge bolke. To hum uske pehle hum unko bole ki hum koi company ke agency apna nahi hai. Ab maal apne paas nahi hai to hum maal supply kaise de payenge? Agla customer to aap buyer to de dijiyega maan ke chaliye. Aap buyer de dijiyega lekin hamare paas maal available nahi rahega to hum kaise de payenge?
Executive: Bilkul theek hai. Customer: Hum bole the. Haan, to ye baat bole us samay wo bole ki us uska tension aap mat lo, hum aapko dono provide kara denge. To jab dono provide kara denge. Buyer supplier kaise sir samjha nahi, jaise aap Ultratech cement mein deal karte hain, TMT bar mein deal karte hain.
Haan.
Executive: To aap keh rahe hain ki TMT bar Ultratech cement ka apne paas stock nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi, koi cheez nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha. To aap ye chahte the ki kharide bhi IndiaMART se aur beche bhi IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Haan. Wo wo waisa bole humko. Aap kharid sakte hain sir. Kharidne ke liye koi dikkat to nahi hai, aap kharid sakte hain. Agar aap IndiaMART se product kharidna chahe, bilkul le sakte hain, Ultratech cement ho gaya, TMT bar ho gaya.
Customer: Haan, sir theek hai, lekin baat raha ki mera jo area hai, jahan hum rehte hain aur mera jo location hai GST aur ye jo kya bolenge form ka jo location hai, Ranchi ka diya hua hai. Ranchi ka location hai aur Ranchi ka location se 150 kilometer door hum gaon mein hai apna ghar, makan dukan jo bhi hai.
Executive: Achcha, achcha.
Customer: Ab ab yahan hai apna dukan chota mota matlab retail mein thoda thoda area mein hum 50 go 20 go 50 100 piece is tarah ka thoda thoda maal hum dete hain.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai.
Customer: To IndiaMART mein koi samay hum aise search maar kar ke dekhe the. Hmm hmm. To search marne ke baad mein customer apna number chala jane se company wala log phone karta hai na ki isko aap is tarah se kaam karna chahte hain to kar sakte hain. Waise hi humko humko phone kiya to fir hum haan kar sakte hain keh kar ke hum bole. Ab is tarah ka dikkat hota hai ye to humko malum nahi tha na.
Executive: Sir wo cheez bilkul theek hai sir, lekin matlab aap IndiaMART se koi cheez kharidna chahe to kharid sakte hain aur bechna chahe to bech sakte hain, bilkul theek hai. Agar aapki agar se aap baat karte hain aur bolte hain mere ko Ultratech cement chahiye, is is quantity mein chahiye, aap le sakte hain. Aapko advance payment karna padega aur matlab payment karna padega aur product kharid sakte hain. Uske baad aap bechna chahe bech sakte hain, usme beech mein jo bhi margin hai, jis rate mein aap bechna chahe, wo aapko apne hisab se dekhna padega sir.
Customer: Haan. To wahi thoda sa dikkat ho raha hai humko nahi kar pa rahe hain, apne paas thoda sa. Sir, ideally to sir mujhe lagta hai ki aapne IndiaMART liya tha to itna to sir aapko bhi samajh mein aaya hoga ki matlab aapke paas stock hona chahiye. Aise kharidna bechna itna aasan to hoga nahi.
Customer: Nahi, hum unko bole the is baat ko nahi hai apne paas mein aisa bol kar ke lekin wo mante nahi the. Sab hum kara denge, aap tension mat lo. Agla payment karega usi payment ko udhar buyer mein matlab supplier se muhaiya kara kar ke udhar se hi aap maal dilwa denge.
Executive: To abhi aap keh rahe ho aapke paas koi material nahi hai sir, cement wagera TMT wagera kuch nahi hai?
Customer: Hai sir, 50 100 piece ek 150 200 piece hai to aisa mein kya kaam chalega?
Executive: Ji wo baat sahi hai. To wo aapne offline ke liye rakha hoga aas pass local mein dene ke liye. Haan, ji sir.
Executive: Achcha achcha. IndiaMART ke package mein aap aas pass ke area mein agar dena chahe to nahi de sakte hain. IndiaMART ke through aapke paas Ranchi Ranchi ke aas pass ka Jharkhand ka agar order aata hai to aap usko provide nahi kar sakte hain? Haan to Ranchi Jharkhand. Haan, Ranchi Jharkhand hai to hamare yahan se 150 kilometer door hai. Ab yahan se transporting mein unko bhari pad jayega na.
Executive: Kyunki Ranchi ki leads to aa rahi hain sir, Ranchi ki aaj bhi lead aayi hai cement ki. Haan haan sir, Ranchi ke liye aa raha hai, hum dekhe bhi, baat bhi kiye customer se. Hmm hmm. Jo buyer hai unse humse contact kiya, hum baat kiye aur rate wagera ke bare mein bhi baat kiye lekin transporting yahan se ab ab mere yahan se agar karte hain aur transporting hum bechte hain to bahut door ho raha hai na, 150 kilometer se transporting hai plus labor cost to sabse achcha customer ko usse kam rate mein to wahin mil ja raha hai na local mein.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: 150 kilometer hum log nahi de sakte hain. Haan, ye dikkat hua humko matlab transportation upar nikal ja rahi hai jis vajah se aap de sakte the koi company ka agar waisa bulk mein karne layak ka apne paas punji rehta aur apna location thoda udhar rehta to wo kar sakte the. But isme sabse bada issue hai fund ka.
Customer: Fund ka kaise issue sir jaise?
Executive: Hamare paas agar jyada paisa rehta punji aap laga sakte hain to hum kar sakte the ye baat. Hmm hmm. Jaise 2 4000 5000 cement 2 4 5000 bag cement hum stock karne ka apne paas capacity rehta to aisa kar sakte the to hum kar lete na. Lekin aisa to nahi na apne paas.
Customer: Ji bilkul theek hai sir wo cheez to main aapki samajh raha hun to apne paas funds ki bhi problem hai, itne maal bhi nahi kharid sakte, bahar business bhi nahi kar sakte, near by nahi kar sakte hain bas. Ji. To abhi aap kya matlab aap bol rahe hain services band karane ke liye? Haan, usko kara dijiye. Main kuch dekhta hun matlab kuch din ke baad matlab ek aad saal ke baad agar apne paas kuch fund waisa available ho jayega to hum fir contact kar denge. Agar aap continue rakhe agar aap continue rakhe to aisa nahi sir se ye Jharkhand Ranchi aas pass ke order apne paas beech beech mein aate rahenge. Lekin ab unse business karne ke liye sir dekhiye material to apne paas hona chahiye na kam se kam wo aapko dekhna padega. Haan. Haan, wahi dikkat ho raha hai abhi thoda sa. Hum tab tak jo hai nahi hoga to buyer ko provide kar payenge. Ek saal ke baad. Haan. Iska kaam humko achcha laga lekin but wahi dikkat hua humko. Isliye is bar theek hai main ek bar sir isko check karke aage process karwata hun. To jo bhi aapka services chala hai, jitna deduct hoga baki ka amount aapka refund ho jayega.
Customer: Nahi, abhi tak to humko ek rupaye ka bhi kuch nahi hua hai. Haan sir kuch hona na hona dekho sir wo cheez ek alag hoti hai lekin sir services ka paisa to pure data basis pe daily basis pe katega na. To jo bhi apne do mahine ke aas pass ki services chali hai, us hisab se jo bhi deduction hoga hoga. Exact utna hi hoga jitna chala hai baki ka sara paisa aapka jitna bachta hai utna aapka calculate hoke refund ho jayega. Wo aapko bata bhi dega Suraj kitna paisa ja raha hai wo aapko team ek bar inform kar degi uske liye. Haan, theek hai sir. Theek hai baki sir main to dekhiye yahi bolunga aap chahe to chala sakte hain aage but wahi aap mujhe bata rahe hain ki aapko deal karne ke liye material hi nahi hai. To material agar nahi hai to kaise chalega lekin material sir aap arrange kar sakte hain aisa nahi hai ki material arrange material agar arrange karne jaise ho jata na to fir itna din hum ye baat nahi karte. Hum kar lete. Ji sir material to arrange dekhiye karna padega sir wo to aapko package lete time bhi pata hoga ki maal kharidna to padega hi. Ab achanak se paise ki problem hai sir aisa to nahi hua hoga wo to aapko lene se pehle bhi pata hoga ki plan lene se pehle hum usko 10 bar bole hain ho sakta hai hum recording bhi usko kiye honge is baat ko. Hmm. Hmm. Agla ko hum bole the plan lene se pehle. Recording sir kiya ho to please ek bar bhej dijiyega Suraj ko. Ek bar dekh leta hun agar hai to. Kyunki company wala baat agar ho sakta hai nahi recording hota hai wo to ho sakta hai. Recording agar hoga to ek bar bhijwa dijiyega main ek bar check bhi kara lunga. Theek hai sir baki koi issue nahi isme karwata hun sir iska process yahan se aur aapka karwata hun main. Theek hai sir koi issue nahi isme karwata hun. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to discontinue the IndiaMART services.

- Was promised both buyer and supplier leads.

- Lacks funds to buy and sell materials.

- Transportation costs are too high.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to process the service cancellation.

- Confirmed refund of the remaining amount after deduction.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send recording to Suraj.

- Team will inform about refund amount.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, transportation, funds
